Class SecurityInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afserver.ws.security.SecurityInterceptor

    @Provider
public class SecurityInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jboss.resteasy.spi.interception.PreProcessInterceptor
    This class is security interceptor. Some of logic was transfered from my previous project: https:// gitlab.fit.cvut.cz/listivit/letadla/blob/master/flightAirlines/src/main/java/cz/cvut/fel/aos /flightAirlines/security/MySecurityInterceptor.java
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)
